## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 15,000 units                             |
| Rationale                         | To ensure sufficient stock to cover the forecasted demand for the next 5 days, accounting for a potential 10% increase in actual sales and allowing for 1 day of lead time. This order size also allows for a potential discount on the order due to it exceeding the minimum purchase quantity.  |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | The player has planned to purchase 0 units, which would not be sufficient to cover demand. This recommendation ensures sufficient stock is available, minimizing the risk of stockouts. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | Approximately 2.4 days                    |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 6 days                                      |
| Comments                          | This recommendation utilizes two vendor order quantities of 15,000 units. This approach allows for a potential discount and avoids exceeding the shelf life limit. |
